text:
I am using latest mod_fcgid 2.3.9

From time to time I do a graceful restart (apachectl graceful).
Sometimes there is an error in the logs:

[Mon Jun 22 13:48:11.447638 2015] [mpm_worker:notice] [pid 27601:tid 140022656644864] AH00297: SIGUSR1 received.  Doing graceful restart

[Mon Jun 22 13:48:25.863836 2015] [fcgid:error] [pid 11604:tid 140022656644864] FastCGI process 11681 still did not exit, terminating forcefully

[Mon Jun 22 13:48:27.109884 2015] [mpm_worker:notice] [pid 27601:tid 140022656644864] AH00292: Apache/2.4.12 (Unix) mod_fcgid/2.3.9 configured -- resuming normal operations


I ask to pay attention to how much time passed from the beginning to the end of the restart. Graceful restart was accomplished in 16 seconds because of this issue.

How I can prevent this behavior?
